### Inverse function

Suppose f(x) = x/(1+x)
What would be the inverse function

```{r}
yacas('Solve(x/(1+x)==y,x)')
```

### 

### Composite function

Suppose f(x) = x+1, g(x) = x^4;  
Now to find the composite function g(f(x))

```{r}
x = Sym('x')
gx = function(x) {
  yacas(Eval(x^4),list(x=x))
}
fx = x+1 # Just plain, no brackets
gx(fx) # No 'yacas'
Expand(gx(fx))
```
